summary: A group of adventurers make off with 600 kilograms of gold in Guyana, but when their helicopter crashes in the jungle, gold fever takes over.
cast: Clovis Cornillac|Audrey Dana|Patrick Chesnais|Claudio Santamaria|Bruno Solo|Eriq Ebouaney|Gérard Klein|Mehdi Nebbou|Hubert Saint-Macary|Jean-Pierre Martins|Julie Paraense|George Caldas|Serge Abattucci|André Dimpay|Romildo Grand-Bois|Philippe Passon|Gaston Ferreira|Ambre Keita|Ilan Chain-Atipa|Roger Vaiti|Francis Meyer|Roby Raymond Allen|Yvon Vernet|Benedito Alves Da Paixo|Nick Amanajas|François Patient|Diony Da Silva Vieira|Norbert Labonte|Jacqueline Ady|Aline Archer|Marie-Thérèse Guy|Acimilda Palmeirim Barata|Andrini Michelle Palmeirim Dos Santos|Zacaria Lucas|Mario Elie|Marcio Rodrigues Barbosa|Kaio Santos Da Silva|Fenel Hyacinthe|Paulo Roberto|Michel Amiemba|José Gabriel Almeida Maia|Christian Valsamidis|Francisco Santana Lima|Magalie Buonamassa|Olga da Silva|Dominique Verschaeve|Arnaud Metairie|Johanna Caudal|Ghislaine Guiomen|David Lhoste|Abigaël Caboelefodo|Nicklas Charles|Léon Bricout
title: 600 kilos de oro puro
